Next_reimagined. Manager, Data Engineering This  is a senior data engineer within our North American team. Our teams work on the latest data  technologies in the Cloud space including BigQuery, Redshift, Spark, etc.  This position will be focused on building out a data warehouse, data  integration, or machine learning automation projects in various cloud  environments.
